title: A Car That Turns
author: Amir Rajan
description: It's about a car that turns.

title: A Letter to Luna
author: seasalty
description: A very short rhythm game created for the TeenyTiny DragonRuby MiniGameJam.  Use the power of music to send your letter! Score well enough and you might even get something back...

title: adrift
author: ahnlak
description:
adrift is a simple 'stay on the screen' game. Your spaceship is adrift, with an increasingly broken engine. Every time you fire it, it increases in power and can be ... sticky.

The aim of the game is simple; keep your spaceship on the screen. How long can you last?

title: BombChain
author: Kanaz312
description:
Blow up as many bombs as you can! You get one chance to trigger bombs and two bombs to place after triggering.

Blue bombs shoot out bullets, keeping the chain going. Red bombs destroy bullets.

Controls:
Mouse: Explode bombs, place bombs
Enter: Start game
Arrows : Change number of bombs for next round
R: randomize bomb starts
D: Toggle debug mode for next round

title: Bug Count
author: J. B. Pichelski
description: Just as frustrating as finding real computer bugs Count how many bugs appear on the screen. The more you get right, the harder it gets.

title: cakestack
author: Steria773
description:
Simple cake stacking game done in Ruby via DragonRuby GTK!

Controls

Just, Click or hit space key to stack!

title: Cat Herder 2020
author: danhealy
description:
The ultimate 20-second herding cats simulator.

Instructions: Click & drag cats onto the rug.  Get them all on the rug at the same time before the timer runs out.

title: Cloud Miner
author: phasefx
description:
20 seconds for the TeenyTiny DragonRuby MiniGameJam.

Left-click to find the hidden targets (or hold left-click for an easier time).

title: Collect the Dots
author: kfischer_okarin
description:
Collect all the dots within 20 seconds.

Move with the arrow keys.

title: Deliver the Packages!
author: otaconio
description:
Deliver packages to the green houses before time (or your gas tank) runs out!

You have 20 seconds to deliver the packages!
Use WASD or the Arrow Keys to move around
Pick up fuel barrels to replenish your gas
Warning: due to randomness, some level configurations may not be solvable!

title: Dink
author: jeorb, aecium
description:
Dink is a 20 second retro gaming hit of nostalgia.

WASD or arrow keys control Dink's movement and space key shoots a rupee.

title: Dragon Quest Rush
author: meltinglight
description: This game was done for the TeenyTiny DragonRuby MiniGameJam 2020. It is my first game.

title: DragonJump
author: Cutiekittypet
description:
Mini platformer game for TeenyTiny DragonRuby MiniGameJam.

Click the left mouse button to jump. Try to get the highest score!

title: Emerald Eater
author: arkive
description:
Collect the emeralds. Avoid the red bumpers. Each emerald is worth 1 point. Don't be too slow; every 10 seconds, the bumpers are cleared but 4 points are deducted. 

WASD / Arrow keys - move

ESC - pause

ENTER - restart

title: Fake Moon
author: Grotesk
description:
Guide your fake moon to catch all the lunar landers. You have twenty seconds, don't miss any! It is inspired by a certain kind of old-school handheld game and is dedicated to conspiracy theorists everywhere.

Controls:
Left Arrow: go left
Right Arrow: go right
SPACE: start again

title: Get Crackin'
author: phantomxii
description:
The difference between success and failure is twenty seconds! Crack that safe and claim the valuables within before the police arrive!

But in order to do that, you must enter the combination properly!

Enter first number - [LEFT ARROW]
Enter second number - [RIGHT ARROW] after first number is correct
Enter third number - [LEFT ARROW] after second number is correct

title: Ghost Trap
author: robotspacefish
description: Catch as many ghosts as you can in 20 seconds.

title: Lunar Drone Lander
author: dcsw
description:
You have 20 seconds to land on the moving platform without crashing into it. Note the green / red indicators in the top right for angle, vertical speed, and horizontal speed. 

Spacebar/Up/W for thrust. Left/Right or A/D for rotation.

title: Mato - The TeenyTiny Tech Demo
author: CANICVS
description: Use your jetpack to fly across the map as fast as possible!

title: Mean Muggin'
author: ha1fie
description:
Catch the mug before it falls off the table!

[SPACE] to catch
[ESC] to exit to the title screen

title: Mother of Rugrats
author: Lernakow
description:
Thou shall not sleep!

Instructions

Use LEFT and RIGHT arrows to rotate
Use UP and DOWN arrows to move
SWEETS attract RUGRATS
SPROUTS repel RUGRAT
STOOLS block YOU, but RUGRATS crawl underneath
Find PACIFIERS to WIN
Avoid RUGRATS or LOSE

title: padok
author: toinebeg
description:
A simple maze game.

Click on the octogons to find the path between the colored nodes.

As the levels are totally random, you might be stuck, press r to generate another level or press q to go back to main menu.

title: Persolvo
author: Sabrina
description: This is a single level prototype puzzle game that I built as a part of the teeny tiny game jam, in an attempt to learn DragonRuby.

title: Pop It
author: GameDevMatt
description:
here is the simple story of the Ninja who want to improve his skills, So he sets a timer of 20 Secs and tries to hit the balloon as many times as he is able.

push space button to start the arrow moving, and release the space button to launch the arrow!

title: Quest for the Youth Potion
author: Ninus Hideon
description: Click in the ghosts to banish them and protect the mage, helping him reach the youth potion.

title: Slay the Lich
author: HIRO-R-B
description: The world is about to be destroyed by a Lich. Save it with your arrow keys!

title: Slime Jump
author: HIRO-R-B
description:
You're a slime and you like floaty orbs. Jump and catch them!

Press Space to jump
Press R to reset

title: Spotlight Search
author: Miriad
description: A cute "keep him in the spotlight!" game I whipped up as a sample for TeenyTiny DragonRuby MiniGameJam!

title: SwatGame
author: Cutiekittypet
description: Click the mouse to swat bugs! Swat as many bugs as you can in 20 seconds!

title: Teeny Tiny Smithy
author: Xed
description: An apprentice must step in to save the village after the smithy's untimely demise. The blacksmith is dead! Dark denizens approach... Craft weapons. Slay them before time runs out!

title: Teeny Tiny Space Game
author: guitsaru
description: A 20 second space shooter

title: Simple
author: Grotesk
description: When the game tells you to click on a coloured shape, click on it. Don't make any mistakes! That's all there is to it!

title: The Ghost Of Flash Ads Past
author: mikemar10
description:
Relive the early 2000's and try to win a prize! Holiday Edition! Heavily inspired by the flash ads from the early 2000's that would demand you punch the monkey.

Are you a bad enough dude to deliver 1,000 presents to Santa in 20 seconds?

Controls

Click Santa as many times as you can in 20 seconds

Press 'r' to restart the game

title: Tiny Plumbing
author: m4rek
description:
Connect the left side to the right side, click tiles to rotate them. You have 20 seconds to score as high as you can.

1 point is awarded for each tile cleared by connecting. Connections are scored and cleared after a few seconds.

title: Tiny Ski
author: spunos
description: Move the mouse to control the skier. Click to restart. Don't hit any trees (or bears). Try to survive for 20 seconds!

title: V-na√Ør
author: jujule
description:
Bullet Hell meets QTE. Arrows to move

Space to shoot
'c' to launch action when the energy bar is full

title: Vertices!
author: ahnlak
description: Vertices is a simple game, where you have 20 seconds to click on the shapes with the fewest vertices, or sides.  Can you clear 10 shapes before the time runs out? What about 20?! More?!?!
